## RestTransferStateService.hasKey() method

Gets indication whether requested key exist in stored transfer key data

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | <code>string</code> | Key identifying value |
